products.title: Rimini, Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: Rimini sand's pale yellow-cream hue is a pretty, uplifting addition to any window. Its light translucency means that plenty of light penetrates it, even when closed, so you'll never be lacking in sunshine. Pair sand with navy blues and light-coloured woods for a modern look with a unique twist, or with browns, greens, and golds for something classic and luxurious. Either of these would be the perfect look for the living room or dining room in a contemporary, stylish home.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout), Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in sand is a stylish, light, and vibrant blackout blind with a subtle, patterned texture. Its simple and neutral feel makes it the perfect solution to adding style to a room. The sand colour makes this blind ideal for being added to bedrooms with a light blue colour scheme to give the whole room a natural, seaside feel throughout. Alternatively, add the sand to rooms with authentic wood features and bold tones for fantastic, striking colour contrasts.

products.title: Spectrum, Alabaster - Venetian Blind
products.description: Beautiful, creamy beige will fill your windows when you use the spectrum alabasta. The gleaming gloss finish offsets the high quality and durability of the heavy gauge aluminium slats, whilst still maintaining an air of elegance and sophistication. Soften bold reds and deep purples in the dining room or bedroom by placing the alabasta amongst rich, block colour walls, and accenting with matching creams and beiges.

products.title: Spectrum, Deep Alabaster - Venetian Blind
products.description: The rich cream of the spectrum's deep alabasta is contemporary style at its finest, combining high quality, sturdy aluminium slats with colour-coordinated pull-cords and rails to create a neutral, easy-on-the-eye blind that will stand the test of time. Use the alabasta to complement deep purples or forest greens in the living room, den, or dining room, where it will create a subtle break to rich colours.

products.title: Roma, Mushroom - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma in mushroom is the classic neutral. In an unassuming natural beige, it works as an attractive canvas for the rest of your decor. The fabric is durable and high-quality, as is the entire roma range, and is a worthy investment for a long-lasting window dressing. Pair the mushroom with fellow naturals, using everything from barely-there biscuits to delicious chocolate browns. Ensure at least part of the decor features strong colours with which to contrast against this natural tone, and include woods and wickers for a rustic feel.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Putty - Roller Blind
products.description: The textured neutral of the sarra (blackout) putty is an accommodating shade of cream that works well with almost any colour it meets. The quality blackout fabric will keep even the brightest uv rays out, as well as night-time disturbances such as headlights and street lamps. Complement rich browns for a traditional colour scheme in the home office, or pair with apple green or sky blue for a fresh, summery feel in the kitchen.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Beige - Roller Blind
products.description: Compose a sophisticated look with the roma (fr) in beige, where a soft and subtle fabric forms an elegant blind with a modern and practical edge. With flame-retardant, crease-free fabric, mounted on a simple rolling mechanism, this graceful blind brings soothing colour and understated style. Frame the beige with plush fabrics in complementing mocha or chocolate tones to form a window display that's full of contrast and alluring colour.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Putty - Vertical Blind
products.description: The perfect cream shade, the sarra (blackout) in putty offers neutral elegance and can be blended with all kinds of colours. Its gently raised patterning adds texture and depth, preventing this blackout blind from being just another block-colour blind. For a neutral and unobtrusive colour scheme in the home office, that won't distract you from your work, mix the putty with mocha browns and cappuccino beiges - providing the perfect mood for that afternoon break's coffee.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Beige - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a modest look with soothing shade, choose the roma (fr) in beige, which hosts a calming oatmeal hue on a crisp and contemporary cloth. The modern style and adjustable slats of the blind allow you to create a chic display that lets you control the amount of light and air entering the room. Match the beige with harmonising walls in a sumptuous biscuit shade, adding a deeper taupe to accent the tone of the blind and for an assortment of similar hues.

products.title: Cotswold, Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
products.description: In light, country cream, with a trendy, chalk finish, the cotswold's oatmeal is a pretty and neutral choice. The matt paint makes this blind unobtrusive yet inherently attractive, an effect that is only added to by its coordinating pieces and parts. Partner the oatmeal with a lush sky blue in a child's bedroom, where the pale tone of the blind will allow cute patterns and fun characters on bedlinen and wall hangings to stand out on their own.

products.title: Anthology, Sand Dune - Roller Blind
products.description: Inspirational quality is the only way to describe sand dune, and if you think we're exaggerating then just look at the intricacy of the weave. It's the foundation on which the rest of the design is built, and offers plenty of room for the subtle flecks of white to express themselves. Matching sand dune with other textured finishes like fine wooden grains and cracked leather is a great way to build a theme that's about more than just pure colour.

products.title: Cotswold, Oatmeal Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Ideal for crafting a light and airy aesthetic, the pale and contemporary cotswold in oatmeal gloss provides a stylish alternative to a classic wood finish. The cream paint is high gloss which, in combination with the blind's coordinating accessories, creates a united and streamlined look. Transform a neutral room into a smart and usable home office space by mixing the oatmeal gloss with sister creams and on-trend coppers.

products.title: Ferns, Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns in sand is the dreamy and relaxing fabric you have been searching for, and it's now available as a classic roller blind. The causal way in which the ferns twist and turn on the fabric, catching the light in different ways as they go is testament to the refined subtlety of the design. Transforming the guest bedroom used to be the job that would never end, but those days are now a thing of the past.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Sand Dune - Roller Blind
products.description: If you love to get away from the hustle and bustle and make your way to the coast then the anthology (blackout) range's sand dune fabric could be just what you need. It combines an intricate weave with a colour that ebbs and flows effortlessly. Perfect for adding a refined touch to any home. When you take in the intricate way in which the shades and tones flow into one another you come to appreciate the keen eye for detail that must have created it.

products.title: Crosshatch, Sandstorm - Roller Blind
products.description: Sandstorm provides a touch of natural colour combined in perfect harmony with a luxurious pattern that ticks all the right boxes. This is a fabric that means something different to different people. You might feel it's luxurious, authentic, glamorous, elegant, or a whole host of other things. What matters is you find a place for it in your home. We love the idea of using the gentle sandy colour to add a sleepy and wholesome quality to the bedroom.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout), Sahara Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: Verdi (blackout) sahara sand takes its inspiration from the endless expanse of desert that allows your mind to wander. The calming colour is perfect for setting your mind at ease, whilst the authenticity of the curves means you can add that regal touch you've been searching for. Pairing sahara sand with a variety of patterned wall papers and rugs is a great way to breathe new life into the living room.

products.title: Luster, Desert Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: Desert sand from their luster range introduces a delicate array of colours into the mix that you won't find anywhere else. From woody browns to crisp whites, and with plenty of sandy tones thrown in for good measure, it offers a welcome relief from the single colour fabrics you've been looking at until now. Introducing a calm and natural style of decor is something that more and more homes are doing in the last few years and when you see the results online it's easy to see why.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
products.description: Right on trend, the cotswold deluxe in oatmeal has a matt, chalky finish, perfect for any kind of design scheme from shabby chic to country rural to contemporary sleek. In matching cream, high quality components are provided, including woven ladder tapes that back the wide slats. Settle the oatmeal into a rural setting, surrounding it with organic hues such as sage and terracotta in a kitchen or dining space.

products.title: Devonshire, Mushroom - Roman Blind
products.description: Indulge your home with sophisticated shades and elegant style with the devonshire in mushroom, where a weave of slender threads form a simple blind with a graceful fall and a subtly modern, light grey tone. Merge the mushroom with soothing shades of mink, biscuit, and cream for a calming palette that offers warming hues and alluring comfort. Combine the scheme with alike textured cloths and rustic patterns for a country theme to create a tranquil and comforting haven in your living room or bedroom.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Oatmeal Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: The cotswold deluxe in oatmeal gloss displays an array of shiny, painted horizontal slats, which match the accompanying components of rails and ladder tapes. The slats can be tilted to be fully closed for privacy and light-blocking or completely open for light and ventilation. Form a classy living area by opting for a traditional chocolate and cream colour palette, placing the oatmeal gloss against a dark brown focal wall and surrounding cream walls.

products.title: Faux Suede, Parchment - Roman Blind
products.description: Establish a sophisticated dcor scheme with the faux suede in parchment, where a sumptuous and velvety cloth creates a modern roman blind with a divine texture, all in a modish cream tone for a simple yet elegant look in your home. Combine the lavish cream hue of the parchment with neutral tones of latte, biscuit, and taupe to add warmth and depth, or golden shades for a touch of luxe. Be sure to include opulently embroidered fabrics and cosy textures for a welcoming feel in an otherwise grand scheme.

products.title: Devonshire, Biscuit - Roman Blind
products.description: The devonshire in biscuit is created from a blend of cotton-like threads, woven to form a delicately textured cloth with a relaxed fall and sophisticated look, and showcasing a modern and versatile shade of beige to offer simple style with soothing and comforting colour. Blend the biscuit with alike fabrics for a rustic, country theme that incorporates alluring textures, merging the subtle beige tone with harmonising shades of caramel, mink, and cream to form a soothing palette for elegant style.

products.title: Parchment, Wedgewood - Roman Blind
products.description: Vintage blue meets rustic red in the parchment in wedgewood, where both of these pretty hues are balanced by the ivory background and soft grey detailing. The pattern is intricate and striking, without being overwhelming. Turn your guest bedroom into a real treat for visitors by opting for this unusual colour scheme. Remember to include plenty of home comforts, like a warm duvet, plenty of blankets and throws, and of course, a scatter cushion or two - not to mention a good lamp for ambiance.

products.title: Parchment, Feather - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty parchment range this time offers up a delicate palette of soft blues and barely there greys, in the work of art that is the feather. The ivory white background shows off the soft hues to perfection, making it the ideal base for this floral arrangement. Tone down a blue feature wall in your living room or dining room by pitting the feather against it. Paint the remainder of the walls in ivory or off-white and use blue hues to accent throughout the rest of the room, adding the occasional grey or charcoal for balance and depth.

products.title: Parchment, Fern - Roman Blind
products.description: The delicate foliage and blossom pattern of the parchment in fern is balanced out wonderfully by the strength of the burnt orange and apple green tones used to colour it. The off-white backgrounds shows off the pattern to perfection. Go for an autumnal dcor scheme in your kitchen for ultimate cosiness. Find a balance between warm orange tones and cooler green ones, and include plenty of light and medium woods for a natural look.

products.title: Magnum, Beige - Day Night Blind
products.description: In grey-toned oatmeal, the beige, like the whole magnum range, displays an attractively natural aesthetic, combining its neutral colouring with a textured stitching. The range's translucent, moveable strips allow versatile privacy and light control. For a light, yet protective, window covering in your living room, employ the subtle beige, which will blend perfectly into a chocolate and cream colour scheme.

products.title: Vogue, Beige - Day Night Blind
products.description: In subtle peachy cream, the vogue in beige is a soft and appealing blind, comprising of pliable, tightly stitched fabric and clear, see-through strips. All brackets and controls are concealed neatly in the overhead rail cassette, keeping the look clean and tidy. Pair the beige with pretty corals for a sweet and summery aesthetic in the living room. This 'peaches 'n' cream' look can be easily achieved by sticking to a base of cream and furnishing and accessorising with the coral tones, using them for throws, cushions, and wall hangings.

products.title: Honeycomb, Stone - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a subtle honeycomb patterning, filled with abstract style daisies in the centre, the honeycomb in stone blends soft grey tones with off-white and sunny yellow. The look is fairly contemporary but will work well in any setting where a tempered, muted feel is on the cards. For a look that will be bang on trend, hang the stone against a soft yellow wall in a study or guest bedroom, where your room will be fashion forward with a grey and yellow colour scheme.

products.title: Honeycomb, Teal - Roman Blind
products.description: To give a big pop of colour to your home, consider the honeycomb in teal. This rich canvas of dark and light teal tones, with honeycomb shapes filled with daisies, offers a strikingly abstract look that you're sure to love. Use the teal to liven up a bright white study or home office, adding a little inspiration as you get down to work. Accent the colours of the fabric with matching teal hues in the form of ornaments and oddments, going for ice white and contemporary furniture.

products.title: Honeycomb, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: An unusual blind with fascinating patterning, the honeycomb navy features a subtle honeycomb patterning filled with abstract daisies, all in deep navy, mustard, and white tones. You'll love the contemporary feel to this blind, blending nature with abstract in one fell swoop. Use the navy for a cosy feel to a den or sitting room, filling the room with wooden furniture and matching navy tones. Use a gentle white paint for the walls, and highlight with mustard tones in your oddments and wall art.

products.title: Origin, Mushroom - Vista Blind
products.description: Origin mushroom allows you to control the light and shade in your home with minimal effort, whilst at the same time adding a richly authentic aesthetic that gives every modern decorated home the homely touch. Look closer and you'll see the subtle patterning of the voile as it hangs elegantly in front of the fabric. Beiges, sandy browns, and lightly coloured leathers all work beautifully when placed against origin mushroom.

products.title: Nova, Oatmeal - Roman Blind
products.description: The soft beige of the nova oatmeal creates a gorgeously subtle neutral that will work with a wide range of colour and decor schemes. The smoothly textured fabric, with its luxe suede feel, is irresistible to touch and works fantastically in the curved crimps of the roman. Soften a dark, plummy by combining it with the tempering oatmeal in a moody master bedroom or living room. Opt for a boldly pattern wallpaper, featuring the plum, and set the blind against this.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Putty - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Emperor, Mushroom - Roman Blind
products.description: Generate elegance and style by including emperor in mushroom in your dcor, where a silky thread forms a chiffon-like blind with a ribbed effect. The shimmering grey shade will blend with most subdued dcor schemes for a touch comforting texture and dazzling colour. Create a cool and contemporary look in a basic white bedroom by including soothing shades of dove grey and eye-catching silver accessories.

products.title: Roller, 1086 Beige - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Flying Pleated, 1259 Classic Sand - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Opaqueinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1259 classic sand - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Roller, 4155 Sand - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Semi-transparentinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.description: Soft lighting effects - dimoutnot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility. Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning. Installs in minutes with the unique velux pick&click. System. Roman blind, 6511 fabulous beige - velux loft blind soft lighting effects - dimoutnot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility.

products.title: Roman Blind, 6504 Stormy Sand - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Soft lighting effects - opaquenot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility. Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning. Installs in minutes with the unique velux pick&click. System. Roman blind, 6504 stormy sand - velux loft blind soft lighting effects - opaquenot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility.

products.title: Roman Blind, 6502 Stormy Beige - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Soft lighting effects - opaquenot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility. Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning. Installs in minutes with the unique velux pick&click. System. Roman blind, 6502 stormy beige - velux loft blind soft lighting effects - opaquenot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility.

products.title: Bayham, Parchment - Vista Blind
products.description: Elegance and sophistication go hand in hand when you caste your eye over the bayham range. Parchment compliments the free flowing nature of the voile panels with gently placed strips of soft white fabric that is as finely woven as it is calm and refreshing. Parchment allows you to make a feature of your window spaces again as you celebrate the beauty of the simple things in life. Keeping your decor crisp and calm with large white scatter cushions and a light grey rug will give your living room the relaxing look and feel that you have always wanted.
